data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo, aarii keetiin na hin ifatin
Xiyyooliin kee na waraananiiru;
Sababii dheekkamsa keetiitiif dhagni koo fayyaa dhabeera;
Cubbuun koo na liqimseeraatii;
Sababii gowwummaa kootiitiif,
Ani gad nan qabame; gadis nan cabe;
Dugdi koo na bobaʼa;
Ani laafeera; akka malees bututeera;
Yaa Gooftaa, hawwiin koo hundinuu fuula kee duratti beekamaa dha;
Lapheen koo ni dhaʼatti; jilbis na laafeera;
Michoonni koo fi miiltoon koo sababii madaa kootiitiif narraa hiiqan;
Warri lubbuu koo galaafachuu barbaadan kiyyoo naa kaaʼaniiru;
Ani garuu akkuma duudaa dhagaʼuu hin dandeenyee,
Ani akka nama dhagaʼuu hin dandeenyee,
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani sin eeggadha;
Ani, “Akka diinonni koo natti gammadan
Ani kufuu gaʼeeraatii;
Ani balleessaa koo nan himadha;
Warri akkasumaan diinota koo taʼan jajjaboo dha;
Warri qooda waan gaarii waan hamaa naa deebisan diinota koo ti;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati na hin gatin;
Yaa Gooftaa, yaa fayyisaa ko,
